name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

name: Greek Salad
description: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and Greek dressing.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Ripe tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, olive oil, and balsamic glaze.

name: Mediterranean Salad
description: Mixed greens, roasted peppers, artichoke hearts, and vinaigrette dressing.

name: Spinach and Strawberry
description: Fresh spinach, sliced strawberries, almonds, feta, and raspberry vinaigrette.

name: Asian Sesame Salad
description: Napa cabbage, carrots, mandarin oranges, almonds, and sesame ginger dressing.
